summary: This is an email from FBI Special Agent Kimberly R. Meder regarding the acceptance of a physical evidence review related to the Epstein case. It appears to be a notification or confirmation of a procedural step in the investigation.

persons.name: Kimberly R. Meder
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email regarding the acceptance of a physical evidence review in the Epstein case.

events.title: Physical Evidence Review Acceptance
events.description: An email indicates that a physical evidence review related to the Epstein case was accepted.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 26, 2021, from FBI Special Agent Kimberly R. Meder.
The email concerns the acceptance of a 'GM Physical Evidence Review' related to the Epstein case.
The document is part of the EFTA00014959 file in Data Set 8 of the released documents.
